question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. fire hydrant
B. white advertisement board
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The white advertisement board is visibly higher up and further back in the urban scene, beyond the trees and buildings, while the fire hydrant is on the sidewalk closer to the foreground.
